page.title: 05Local Character & Events
page.content:
Eltham is mainly a suburban residential area.There is little industry in Eltham and many of the residents commute to work in central London by train or car.
Pupils -St.Thomas More School.
Rochester Way Relief Road.
The Rochester Way Relief Road is being built because they want to build a bigger and better road because the one that we've got now cannot cope with the amount of traffic.At Well Hall,Eltham Well Hall station and Eltham Park station have just been demolished(July 1985) and a new Eltham station has replaced them as part of the relief road improvements.The demolishion of the fine Edwardian station ,Eltham Park, caused some local protest. Pupils-Eltham Hill School.
